    [**Overview of Clinical Research**](https://fammedtalk1.netlify.app)
</p>

**Date: April 28, 2023**

This talk was given to the Faculty of Family Medicine of the Ghana College of Physicians and the West African College of Physicians and Surgeons. It spanned the steps involved in initiating clinical research, data collection and tools, data management, data cleaning, data analysis, and presentation of data.

**Date: August 1, 2023**

As part of the [Ghana Medical Journal](https://www.ajol.info/index.php/gmj) workshop, this talk was done. It went through how to present and review the statistical analysis and results sections of a journal article.
